price: 12. Nabii Yacya yoobokeeh barak tu edde raaqisa caddo yoofe waqdi yacyaw tawraat kitab maqarruk ibbixaay elle taamit, Kaadu nanu nubuwwannuuy turraqsaay fula-le kas kaah necee usuk qunxa awkah anuk iyye Yalli.
arabic: يَٰيَحۡيَىٰ خُذِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِقُوَّةٖۖ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلۡحُكۡمَ صَبِيّٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: yāyaḥyā khudhi al-kitāba biquwwatin waātaynāhu al-ḥuk'ma ṣabiyyan
